opponent.label: Jason
opponent.artist: NeoGhost11, (Special thanks to Nomelet (Blade, mask), Cali)
opponent.description: An alternative female version of Jason, the psychopath who terrorizes Camp Crystal Lake and around, she became obsessed with killing anyone who get in Camp Crystal Lake. She has hatred for drug addicts and bullies. Inspired by the Kotobukiya Bishoujo Horror line.
